techmeme.title: In a filing, ByteDance urged a US court to strike down a law that could ban TikTok in the US, recounting lengthy talks that it says the US ended in August 2022 (David Shepardson/Reuters)
iOS 18 brings a new API called AccessorySetupKit, letting third-party accessory makers build the same quick pairing experience as Apple accessories like AirPods (Filipe Espósito/9to5Mac)
Source: AI chipmaker Cerebras confidentially filed for a US IPO; filing: in early June, it authorized new shares at a steep discount to its 2021 funding round (The Information)
Sources: US DOJ won't pursue FTC's claim that TikTok misled US consumers on data security in a forthcoming suit accusing TikTok of children's privacy violations (Bloomberg)
SpaceX unveils Starlink Mini, a compact version of its satellite internet antenna "that can easily fit in a backpack", offering a "limited number" for $599 each (Michael Sheetz/CNBC)
